name: Arcanum
description: This installer downloads and installs the italian translation 0.2
notes: You will need to download also the other IT translation mods and install them sequentially: 1.0 1.1 0.2 1.2
content:
files:
- patch: http://www.old-computer-mags.net/traduzioni/arcanum/Arcanum_Slideshow_02.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    description: Extracting the patch
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/
    file: $patch
    format: rar
- task:
    description: Running the Patch
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Arcanum_Slideshow_02.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
requires: arcanum
